root.name: Deal or No Deal
root.description: A game based on the popular Tv shiow of the same name. The DS version is noticeably broken with briefcases that do not properly randomize, instead of each briefcase randomly being assigned a different value the game uses set layouts that are easily recognized by more advance players, in addition to this the game does not randomly generate the first round at all meaning the $10,000 briefcase is the same everytime you boot up the game.
